Merging the feature search for each cluster.

```{r}
library(readr)
```



```{r}

fc1 <- read_csv('results/feature_pairs_female_cluster1_thresh04.csv.gz')
fc2 <- read_csv('results/feature_pairs_female_cluster2.csv.gz')
fc3 <- read_csv('results/feature_pairs_female_cluster3.csv.gz')
fc4 <- read_csv('results/feature_pairs_female_cluster4.csv.gz')
fc5 <- read_csv('results/feature_pairs_female_cluster5_thresh04.csv.gz')


mc1 <- read_csv('results/feature_pairs_males_cluster1.csv.gz')
mc2 <- read_csv('results/feature_pairs_males_cluster2_thresh04.csv.gz')
mc3 <- read_csv('results/feature_pairs_males_cluster3.csv.gz')
mc4 <- read_csv('results/feature_pairs_males_cluster4.csv.gz')
mc5 <- read_csv('results/feature_pairs_males_cluster5.csv.gz')

```


```{r}

resdf_f <- bind_rows(list(fc1, fc2, fc3, fc4, fc5))

resdf_m <- bind_rows(list(mc1, mc2, mc3, mc4, mc5))

```
